bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXXXV (Nos 5477-5531)
bibl.seg: N. Gonis, P.J. Parsons & W.B. Henry, with contributions by L.H. Blumell, E. Chepel, C. Cheung, H. Essler, R. Färber, S. Fogarty, B.W. Griffin, G. Hatzitsolis, A. Kalinina, P. Malik, M. Malouta, G. Maltagliati, C. Monaco, M. Mountford, P.M. Pinto, L. Prauscello, I. Privitera, M. Racette-Campbell, G. Ranocchia, A. Sarri, S. Slattery, L. Tagliapietra, T.A. Wayment, M. Zellmann-Rohrer, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXXXV (Nos 5477-5531) = Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 106.
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2020, xii-158 pp., figg., 10 pll. ISBN 978-0-85698-247-7. £85.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXXXV, 5477-5531. - P. v: Preface (N.G.). - I. Theological Texts (5477-5480). - II. New Literary Texts (5481-5483). - III. Known Literary Texts (5484-5494). - IV. Law (5495). - V. Documentary Texts (5496-5531).
